text: Elliott Harris Levitas (born December 26, 1930) is an American politician. He is a former U.S. Representative from Georgia's 4th congressional district. Levitas was elected to the Georgia House of Representatives in 1964 and served from 1965 to 1974. ==Other websites== *Kilpatrick Townsend profile * * Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Georgia Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Atlanta Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Elliott H. Levitas
